mapper.sql: SELECT t.client_id, t.product_plan_sid, t.product_plan_code, t.product_season_sid, t.YEAR, t.season_code, t.material_class_sid, t.company_sid, t.company_brand_sid, t.company_brand_mark_sid, t.plan_quantity, t.kuan_type, t.style, t.series, t.in_out_under, t.onsale_month, t.batch_week, t.product_package_sid, t.cost_target, t.cost_retail_price, t.markup_rate, t.model_type, t.zhutuixiang, t.tuiguangboci_yx, t.remark, t.STATUS, t.handle_status, t.creator_account, t.create_date, t.updater_account, t.update_date, t.confirmer_account, t.confirm_date, t.data_source_sys, t2.company_name, t3.brand_name, t4.brand_mark_name, t5.nick_name AS creator_account_name, t6.nick_name AS updater_account_name, t7.nick_name AS confirmer_account_name, t8.product_season_name, t9.node_name AS material_class_name FROM s_dev_product_plan t LEFT JOIN s_bas_company t2 ON t2.company_sid = t.company_sid LEFT JOIN s_bas_company_brand t3 ON t3.company_brand_sid = t.company_brand_sid LEFT JOIN s_bas_company_brand_mark t4 ON t4.brand_mark_sid = t.company_brand_mark_sid LEFT JOIN sys_user t5 ON t5.user_name = t.creator_account LEFT JOIN sys_user t6 ON t6.user_name = t.updater_account LEFT JOIN sys_user t7 ON t7.user_name = t.confirmer_account LEFT JOIN s_bas_product_season t8 ON t8.product_season_sid = t.product_season_sid LEFT JOIN s_con_material_class t9 ON t9.material_class_sid = t.material_class_sid

SELECT t.client_id, t.product_plan_sid, t.product_plan_code, t.product_season_sid, t.YEAR, t.season_code, t.material_class_sid, t.company_sid, t.company_brand_sid, t.company_brand_mark_sid, t.plan_quantity, t.kuan_type, t.style, t.series, t.in_out_under, t.onsale_month, t.batch_week, t.product_package_sid, t.cost_target, t.cost_retail_price, t.markup_rate, t.model_type, t.zhutuixiang, t.tuiguangboci_yx, t.remark, t.STATUS, t.handle_status, t.creator_account, t.create_date, t.updater_account, t.update_date, t.confirmer_account, t.confirm_date, t.data_source_sys, t2.company_name, t3.brand_name, t4.brand_mark_name, t5.attachment_sid, t5.file_type, t5.file_name, t5.file_path, t6.nick_name AS creator_account_name, t7.nick_name AS updater_account_name, t8.nick_name AS confirmer_account_name, t9.product_season_name, t10.node_name AS material_class_name FROM s_dev_product_plan t LEFT JOIN s_bas_company t2 ON t2.company_sid = t.company_sid LEFT JOIN s_bas_company_brand t3 ON t3.company_brand_sid = t.company_brand_sid LEFT JOIN s_bas_company_brand_mark t4 ON t4.brand_mark_sid = t.company_brand_mark_sid LEFT JOIN s_dev_product_plan_attach t5 ON t5.product_plan_sid = t.product_plan_sid LEFT JOIN sys_user t6 ON t6.user_name = t.creator_account LEFT JOIN sys_user t7 ON t7.user_name = t.updater_account LEFT JOIN sys_user t8 ON t8.user_name = t.confirmer_account LEFT JOIN s_bas_product_season t9 ON t9.product_season_sid = t.product_season_sid LEFT JOIN s_con_material_class t10 ON t10.material_class_sid = t.material_class_sid
mapper.select:
and ( t.client_id like concat('%', #{item}, '%'))
and t.product_season_sid in (#{productSeasonSid})
and t.product_plan_code like concat('%',#{productPlanCode},'%') and ( t.year like concat('%', #{item}, '%'))
and t.season_code in (#{seasonCode})
and t.material_class_sid =#{materialClassSid} and t.company_sid =#{companySid} and t.company_brand_sid =#{companyBrandSid} and t.company_brand_mark_sid =#{companyBrandMarkSid} and t.plan_quantity =#{planQuantity} and ( t.kuan_type like concat('%', #{item}, '%'))
and ( t.style like concat('%', #{item}, '%'))
and ( t.series like concat('%', #{item}, '%'))
and ( t.in_out_under like concat('%', #{item}, '%'))
and ( t.onsale_month like concat('%', #{item}, '%'))
and ( t.batch_week like concat('%', #{item}, '%'))
and t.product_package_sid =#{productPackageSid} and t.cost_target = #{costTarget} and t.cost_retail_price = #{costRetailPrice} and t.markup_rate = #{markupRate} and t.model_type in (
#{item} )
and ( t.zhutuixiang like concat('%', #{item}, '%'))
and ( t.tuiguangboci_yx like concat('%', #{item}, '%'))
and ( t.status like concat('%', #{item}, '%'))
and t.handle_status in (#{handleStatus})
and t.creator_account in ( #{creatorAccount})
and date_format(t.create_date,'%y%m%d') >= date_format(#{beginTime},'%y%m%d') and date_format(t.create_date,'%y%m%d') <= date_format(#{endTime},'%y%m%d') and ( t.updater_account like concat('%', #{item}, '%'))
and t.update_date = #{updateDate} and ( t.confirmer_account like concat('%', #{item}, '%'))
and t.confirm_date = #{confirmDate} and ( t.data_source_sys like concat('%', #{item}, '%'))
${params.dataScope}
order by t.product_plan_code desc
mapper.insert:
insert into s_dev_product_plan client_id, product_plan_sid, product_plan_code, product_season_sid, year, season_code, material_class_sid, company_sid, company_brand_sid, company_brand_mark_sid, plan_quantity, kuan_type, style, series, in_out_under, onsale_month, batch_week, product_package_sid, cost_target, cost_retail_price, markup_rate, model_type, zhutuixiang, tuiguangboci_yx, remark, status, handle_status, creator_account, create_date, updater_account, update_date, confirmer_account, confirm_date, data_source_sys, values
#{item.clientId}, #{item.productPlanCode}, #{item.productSeasonSid}, #{item.year}, #{item.seasonCode}, #{item.materialClassSid}, #{item.companySid}, #{item.companyBrandSid}, #{item.companyBrandMarkSid}, #{item.planQuantity}, #{item.kuanType}, #{item.style}, #{item.series}, #{item.inOutUnder}, #{item.onsaleMonth}, #{item.batchWeek}, #{item.productPackageSid}, #{item.costTarget}, #{item.costRetailPrice}, #{item.markupRate}, #{item.modelType}, #{item.zhutuixiang}, #{item.tuiguangbociYx}, #{item.remark}, #{item.status}, #{item.handleStatus}, #{item.creatorAccount}, #{item.createDate}, #{item.updaterAccount}, #{item.updateDate}, #{item.confirmerAccount}, #{item.confirmDate}, #{item.dataSourceSys},
mapper.update: update s_dev_product_plan client_id = #{clientId}, product_plan_sid = #{productPlanSid}, product_plan_code = #{productPlanCode}, product_season_sid = #{productSeasonSid}, year = #{year}, season_code = #{seasonCode}, material_class_sid = #{materialClassSid}, company_sid = #{companySid}, company_brand_sid = #{companyBrandSid}, company_brand_mark_sid = #{companyBrandMarkSid}, plan_quantity = #{planQuantity}, kuan_type = #{kuanType}, style = #{style}, series = #{series}, in_out_under = #{inOutUnder}, onsale_month = #{onsaleMonth}, batch_week = #{batchWeek}, product_package_sid = #{productPackageSid}, cost_target = #{costTarget}, cost_retail_price = #{costRetailPrice}, markup_rate = #{markupRate}, model_type = #{modelType}, zhutuixiang = #{zhutuixiang}, tuiguangboci_yx = #{tuiguangbociYx}, remark = #{remark}, status = #{status}, handle_status = #{handleStatus}, creator_account = #{creatorAccount}, create_date = #{createDate}, updater_account = #{updaterAccount}, update_date = #{updateDate}, confirmer_account = #{confirmerAccount}, confirm_date = #{confirmDate}, data_source_sys = #{dataSourceSys}, where product_plan_sid = #{productPlanSid}

update.foreach: update s_dev_product_plan client_id = #{clientId}, product_plan_sid = #{productPlanSid}, product_plan_code = #{productPlanCode}, product_season_sid = #{productSeasonSid}, year = #{year}, season_code = #{seasonCode}, material_class_sid = #{materialClassSid}, company_sid = #{companySid}, company_brand_sid = #{companyBrandSid}, company_brand_mark_sid = #{companyBrandMarkSid}, plan_quantity = #{planQuantity}, kuan_type = #{kuanType}, style = #{style}, series = #{series}, in_out_under = #{inOutUnder}, onsale_month = #{onsaleMonth}, batch_week = #{batchWeek}, product_package_sid = #{productPackageSid}, cost_target = #{costTarget}, cost_retail_price = #{costRetailPrice}, markup_rate = #{markupRate}, model_type = #{modelType}, zhutuixiang = #{zhutuixiang}, tuiguangboci_yx = #{tuiguangbociYx}, remark = #{remark}, status = #{status}, handle_status = #{handleStatus}, creator_account = #{creatorAccount}, create_date = #{createDate}, updater_account = #{updaterAccount}, update_date = #{updateDate}, confirmer_account = #{confirmerAccount}, confirm_date = #{confirmDate}, data_source_sys = #{dataSourceSys}, where product_plan_sid = #{productPlanSid}
